Whenever i have to write a comment directed towards a particular person i use "@XYZ" or "@ABC". It is a general rule all over the web.

And when it is not directed towards one particular individual, it is for general public to read, it is not a reply to one person it is a comment or personal opinion. I hope  60 yr old people know better than that.... Like i said before, do not speak about things of which you have no knowledge.
For Example, someone commented here "1. ALL RELIGIONS, AND I MEANS ALL, ARE SIMPLY THEIR TO KEEP POOR PEOPLE POOR AND RICH PEOPLE RICH" .... only this one statement is sufficient to prove how weak knowledge the person is. All religion keep their rich as rich and poor as poor. But if the guy knew about the basics of Islam, he would have written "All religion except Islam"..... Because Islam has one simple and strict rule, charity is mandatory unless all the people in the world have same amount of wealth. For example, even if there are only 100 people alive on earth and 99 of them have 1000$, and one of them is having only 999$, then it is mandatory for those 99 people to give away 1 Cent each from their 1000$ so that the person who is having 999$ only will become equal to them by earning 1 cent on his own and receiving a charity of 99Cent. so now all of them have 1000$. This is what Islam teaches. And 99% of the idiots who are against Islam, they know nothing about it. 

And i don't care if someone uses the pretext "I am against all religions" to disrespect only Islam. They are all hypocrites.
And i dont even care what people call me, wit, fit, jit whatever.. it really doesn't matter. Because what and how i speak my religious teaching. And how others speak what religion they follow, whether its humanity, atheism or whatever....

And 99.99% of the idiots call Islam an Abrahamic religion, again it shows how idiotic and uneducated they are about Islam. Islam is not Abrahamic, its Adamic, Islam started with Adam (Alai Salaam) and Islam is Adamic religion. The first and the only religion on earth. Everything else is innovation.
